metadata.description:
Audiovisual pairings: Singles #1

STVDIO NOUVEAU is one of the earliest web3 native music projects. We originally formed in spring 2020 to experiment with tokenizing music and multimedia art. Almost all of our work is audiovisual in some form. 

Our Sound.xyz debut, “Vapors” is the first track in our new “Singles” series, featuring stand alone tracks that are paired with a visual.

The collector of the golden egg will receive a separate bonus 3D object NFT of the sculpture featured in the image for this piece. Most of our pieces have associated sculpture NFTs.
metadata.name: Vapors - Golden Egg
metadata.title: Vapors
